message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible product at a price that I think you'll find very reasonable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12000. This is a one-time offer, and I'm confident you won't find a better deal anywhere else.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but my budget is quite tight. I would like to propose a price of $8500 for the product.

I understand that you're on a tight budget, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $8500. I'm willing to meet you halfway, though. I can offer it to you for $11000. This is a very competitive price, and I'm confident you'll find it a great deal.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. While $11000 is still beyond my budget, I would like to propose $9500 as a potential compromise.

I'm starting to think we're getting close to a deal, Bob. I can see you're serious about this product, and I appreciate your persistence. I'm willing to come down a bit more, but I need to make a profit, so I can offer it to you for $10500. This is my final offer, and I'm not going any lower.
I appreciate your efforts to reach an agreement, Alice. I am willing to consider $10000 as a fair price for the product, given its value and my budget constraints.
